text: RT @donnabrazile ⁦@LondonBreed⁩ salutes ⁦@SpeakerPelosi⁩. She is getting the San Francisco Democratic Party “Lifetime Achieve Award.” She’s spent a lifetime uplifting others and building a path for the future — for all Americans. Thank you! Proud member of ⁦@TeamPelosi⁩ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ECikZFoUYAIOpyK.jpg

As an abolitionist & women’s rights activist, Sojourner Truth was a major force in the fight to end slavery. After escaping slavery, she used her experiences to educate others & fight for freedom & equal rights. Her powerful speeches influenced many, including Abraham Lincoln. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EClvOyVXkAIVnph.jpg
